title: PININFARINA font
content:
hi,

can anyone please tell me what font is used for PININFARINA?  
Or something similar?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419091425im_/http:/typophile.com/files/clip_image001_5910.jpg)
author: Victor Xavier

comments.content:
Most certainly custom designed.  
You might like [Magneto](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419091425/http:/www.fontbureau.com/fonts/script/Magneto).

The shareware [Top Speed](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419091425/http:/www.dafont.com/top-speed.font?nb_ppp=50&text=pininfarina) is pretty close too.

--- Tamas Ferencz ---
